H0.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of a Screwdriver cocktail. Rum

H1.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of a Screwdriver cocktail. Tequila

H2.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of a Screwdriver cocktail. Gin

H3.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of a Screwdriver cocktail. Vodka

A4.text: A screwdriver is an alcoholic highball drink made with orange juice and vodka.

A5.text: Advertising campaigns in the 1950s and 1960s by vodka brands such as Smirnoff cemented the screwdriver as a vodka favorite.
